message.body: Can you get a hold of Michelle at the moment so just go ahead and fax and mail don't forget to make copies for yourself
Do you have a PC or just mac?
I just found out the only way to report hours in this system is through PC
So you'll be able to charge me to use your PC!!
Lol. No problem using my PC.
I really can't believe you can't use a mac I think it's discrimination and when were they going to tell me!!
I know some people thinking of switching to a Mac. Weird can't use both.
